scripts.setup: cd apps/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev:all: start cmd /c "cd apps/backend && npm run start:dev" && start cmd /c "cd apps/frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd apps/backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.lint: cd apps/backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.db:migrate: cd apps/backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd apps/backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: cd apps/backend && npx prisma migrate reset --force
